DOC.brief_summary: This is a Phase II randomized, double-masked study comparing the safety and efficacy of ATG003 (mecamylamine HCl) 1.0% and 0.3% ophthalmic solutions to placebo in patients with neovascular ("wet") age-related macular degeneration (NV-AMD).
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy of ATG003 in Patients With Wet Age-Related Macular Degeneration (AMD)
